messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gravity Generator Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.
